name: Roman Shade--Small
description:
This is an example of a Roman Shade. The one pictured is medium sized. 

The price is just an estimate. Yours will be a custom shade, so contact me with your measurements and I will provide you with a cost estimate.

Select your fabric at fabric.com or other online fabric stores and send me the link. 

Small window:
width: 20 inches to 34 inches
length: 24 inches to 44 inches

Please send window measurements to my email.

*Customer selects and purchases own fabric and mails to my home.

**The shade is hung on a wood panel with eye hooks, velcro and string. These items are all included.

******COST INCLUDES: materials-- dowel rods, mounting board, eye hooks, plastic rings, cording, velcro, lining

Prices vary. Please contact me for details, with questions and for a cost estimate.

**Can be made larger or smaller.

name: Roman Shade
description:
This is an example of a Flat Roman Shade I've made. Yours will be made with your window measurements and your fabric selection.

Roman Shades add a romantic feel and block light and heat/cold very well.

This price reflects a medium sized window:
width: 35 inches to 44 inches
length 35 inches to 56 inches

This is just an estimate price. Every order will be different. Contact me with your measurements and I will provide you with a cost estimate.

Select your fabric at fabric.com or other on line fabric store.


**The shade is hung on a wood panel with eye hooks, velcro and string. Those items are all included.

***COST INCLUDES: materials-- dowel rods, mounting board, eye hooks, plastic rings, cording, velcro, lining

*Can also be made larger or smaller

PRICES VARY. Please contact me for details, with questions and for a cost estimate

name: Custom Valance
description:
Pictured is a medium sized valance. It is hung with a wood panel supported by brackets (Included).

A medium sized window is approximately 34 inches to 44 inches wide.

*Curtains hanging beneath valance in picture are not included.

**Select your fabric online at joann.com and send me the link, or use your favorite on line fabric store.

***Customer purchases fabric and ships it to me.

PRICES VARY. Please contact me with questions, for details and a cost estimates.

name: Flat Panel Curtain
description:
Pictured is an example of a flat curtain panel. The order is for two panels per window. 

Select your fabric and convo me the measurements and link to your fabric. 

select fabric from joann.com or any other online fabric store.

*tie-back not included

**Customer purchases own fabric and ships it to me.

***Can also be made with a rod pocket or ruffled rod pocket.

PRICES VARY. Contact me for details, with questions and for a cost estimate.

name: Tab top curtains
description:
Pictured is a sample of tabbed curtains. They can be made full panel size, half panel size, or cafe-style. This price reflects two full length panels. 

Convo me for more details.

Send me your window measurements and desired length.

*Customer purchases own fabric and ships it to me.

PRICES VARY. Please contact me with questions, for details and a cost estimate.
